name: Sports Betting
overview:
Hello, my name is Steven Sanders. I’m from Long Island, New York. I am an absolute sports fanatic: you name it and I probably play and/or watch it.

My main interests are sports, music, film, reading, writing and anything creative really. I enjoy the outdoors and love music festivals. I’m very creative and have studied architecture at the University of New York. I love going for drinks, movies, BBQs and trying new things. I enjoy indie music mostly, but will listen to pretty much anything streaming through the radio or P.C.. I read anything from murder mystery to poetry, but I enjoy reading ESPN and CBS Sports pre and post-game analysis for NFL football games. I enjoy NCAA football too. I can’t bet on games locally, so I bet online. Recreationally, just to keep the games exciting while watching on TV.

I’m a pretty talkative and friendly person. Online I’m looking to make new friends around the globe. You can never have enough friends! :)
